tool_description: A fun API combining cowsay and fortune cookies.
name: Fortunecow
title: Fortunecow

api_list.name: List cows faces
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thibaultcha-fortunecow-v1.p.rapidapi.com/faces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thibaultcha-fortunecow-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Say text
api_list.description: The cow says the given text

optional_parameters.name: face
optional_parameters.description: Use a different face template (see "List faces")

optional_parameters.name: cow
optional_parameters.description: Use a different cow template (see "List cows")

api_list.name: Random Fortunecow
api_list.description: The cow uses a random template to say a random fortune cookie
